div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxij die marcij
anno quo supra

Eodem die Richardus Wricht in Amerciamento Curie per assisam
pro perturbio domini Johannis Strachin capellanj cuj emendabit
ut iura volunt

The saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the commissar
to my lorde of abirdene part of the channonnis Ande the aldirman
ande consal for the strubulance and offence done be Richerde
Wricht to sere Jonhne strachin that the saide richerde sal cum one
Sonday that next cumis in tyme of the hie mes' with ane
candile in tyme of the hie mes' his hande of j li' waxe
bairheid' In ane lous' gone and ask the saide sere Jonhne forgivnes
and pray the aldirman consale and chaplannis of the kirk present for
the tyme to make instance to the saide chaplane to remitt the
rancour' of his hirt to the saide Richerd Alsua the saide Richerd'
sale mak him thankful pament of his annuel in tymes to
Cum at Witsonday and martimes Ande gif he falyeis tharintile or
committis ony offence to him or ony wthiris in tyme to Cum
he sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes' werk vnforgevin

The saide day it was sufficientlie preuit be tua witnes that Wilyeam
philpe suld' pay to Dauid Steuarte xviij s' Scottis for the
dusane of clathis quhilk he bocht fra him

the samyne day henrik horum Come dettour be his hand'
vphaldin to William nicholsone burges of this burghe' for
Sandy robertsone burges of banff for xiij s' and iiij d' to be
pait at Witsonday next hereftir

The samyn day Wat atkin falyeit in his preif of x s' to
henrik horum quhilkis day was assignit him to preyf his
pament of the said x s'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die mensis
marcij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo tercio

The samyn day Jonhne menyeis thomas mar and William blinsele
was chosin be the aldirman and consal ande suorne the gret
aithis to taxt and extent the ix barrel and demi of gret salt acht to george
eduardsone amang the personis that resavit the Salt out of the
Inglis Schipe Ande thai haue ordanit that murthow glenmal
uyn and Dauid Steuarte sal gathir and Inbringe the saide
Salt quhen it is taxt fra the avaris and ane officiar' sale
pas with thame to se that thai be nocht dissobeit in the gatherin'
of the salt forsaid' Ande gif thai wile nocht gathir at the consale
has ordanit the aldirman and balyeis to compele and distrenyhe
the saidez murthow and Dauid and thar gudis for the pament of the saide
ix bollis and demi of Salt

Be it maide kend tile al mene be thir present lettres vs aldirman
ballieis consale ande communite of the burghe' of abirdene and commissaris
chosin apone the assedacion of the wattiris and fischingis of the samyn
in the tyme of the makinge of thir present lettrez Tile haf gevin grantit
and tile haue sett Ande be thir our present lettres gyffis grantis and Settis
til our belouet frende mastir Androw Cadiow and tile cristiane of cadiow
the spous' of vmquhil androw alansone and falyeing of hir to the said
mastir Androw and til his assignais ane half nethe of the raik apon the
wattir of Dee and the fischingis of the samyn with the pertinence or ellis
als' gude at the next assedacion to be maide eftir this our last general
assedacion of nyne yeris being complet and runnyn The saidez mastir
androw cristiane and falyeing of hir he or hir assignais payand
yerlie tile vs and our Successouris siclik malys and deviteis as
ony nichbuir' sal pay for siclik takis and at siclik termes The
entray of the saide mastir androw cristiane and falyeing of hir
he or his assignis in and with the said half neth' of the raik or
ellis als' gude at the vscheay of the said last general assedacion
Ande frathin furtht to bruik and peciable' Jois' the samyn
with the pertinence fredomes and comoditeis quhatsumeuire quhile
the termes of the next assedacion to be maide be fullie complet and runnyn
but ony questione or demavnde of vs or our successoris to be
maid in the contrar' And gif the said mastir Androw cumis nocht and remanys
personalie within the said' burghe at his Entre in the saide fischingis
as vthiris nichburis / thane it salbe lesum to the aldirman balyeis
Consal and communite and commissaris for the tyme to dispone frely
apon the said fischingis but ony Impediment or demavnd' Ande
we the saidez aldirman balyeis consal and communite and commissaris oblis' vs
and our successoris in the sikirast forme of obligacion to warand' keip and
defend' to the saidez mastir Androw cristian and falyeing of hir to him
ande his assignez the saide half neth' of the Raik and the fischingis
of the samyn or ellis als' gude In manere and forme befor writin for
ale the termes of the next assedacion to be maide be al our
wattiris and gudis agannis al dedlie In witnes of the quhilkis
to thir our present lettres our' commone Sele is appensit at the
saide burghe' the xxj day of the monetht of September'
the yer' of god jM iiijC and Auchty yeris

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
marcij Anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo tercio

The samyn day Williame Kintor grantit him avand to alexander
menyeis xx s' and ij d' to be pait within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne Steuarte was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' Williame blinsele forspekar for the haldin of ane
wranguis' partis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die
marcij Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Alexander nachty
est legittimus et propinquior heres et filius quondam Johannis nachty
Et datum fuit Dauid prat balliuo in mandatis ad cogno
scendum ipsum ad terram suam in vico superiore ecclesie

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo
die mensis aprilis Anno quosupra

The samyn day Williame of Kintor grantit him avande
to alexander menyeis iiijor s' and vj d' for the defens' of
the last generale assedacione

The samyn day the consale and communite that was present for the
tyme ordanit the aldirman to caus' the belman pas' throw
the tone' and Inquer be oppin waring' gif thar was ony
procuratour or procuratouris factour or Intromettouris of mastir
Androw Cadiow that walde fische half ane nethis of the mydchin
gile to cum this day or to morne to the aldirman and he
sal caus' thame to haue marouschipe Ande gif nayne
walde fische the saide demi nethis thai ordanit the aldir
man to Intromett and ger fische it In the townis nayme
ande to ansuer to the tone for safar profitis as he gettis
of it this yer' the grathtis being allouit tharintill and he sal
ansuer' for nay forthir thane he gettis And' atour' the aldirman
askit at Androu culan and at vthiris gif ony hed' richt marou
schip to Strek demi nethis of the mydchingile In the
tovnis nayme

xij die aprilis Johannes blak fecit constituit et creauit Andream fyf suum
procuratorem legittimum ad prosequendum thomam narne pro iniusta detencione ab eo
Septem s' j d' and ij le may skinnis promitten' de Rato et grato

Curia Capitalis burgi de
Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvto die
mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo tercio
quo die Sectis vocatis et Curia affirmataffirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo Secte

The said' day Thomas Jamesone seriande producit ane ringe of gold'
prisit per certan suorne personis to xviij s' of Scottis money to the
pament of certan annuele rent aucht to Androw murray eldar be
Symon' gardin quhilkis Ringe the balyeis chargit the the saide
thomas to offir to the said' Symond' gif he walde red the saide
xviij s' And' gif he refusit to deliuer the said' Ring to the saide Androw
for the said' xviij s' as it was prisit be the prisouris suorne tharto

head.add: dominus m nicholson Magister Alexander bissat

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus ac magister Alexander
byssat capellanus altaris Sancti Sanguinis situati infra ecclesiam parochiale
beati nicholaij de Abirdene protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
quatuor s' de terra thome prat in futy inter terram Johannis lammynton'
ex boriali ex vna et terram Johannis matland' ex australi partibus ab altera
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Alano litstar Andrea Watsone et thoma Jamesone
seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dictus magister Alexander protestabatur pro vno annuo
Redditu xiij s' et iiij d' annuatim sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico Castri inter terram quondam Ade Kyme
sone ex boreali communionem viam regiam ex australi Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Alano litstar Andrea Watsone et thoma Jameson
seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Johannes matlande protestabatur pro
vnoo annuo Redditu xiij s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico Castri extra portum orientalem eiusdem
inter montem castri ex australi et communiones vias regias ex boriali
et orientali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Willelmo blicht Willelmo cardey
et thoma Jameson seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dominus Johannes blak procurator Magistri
Willelmi Colison Strathachin capellanj altaris beati Johannis
baptiste et protestabatur pro vno annuo Redditu xviij s' sibi
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram gilberti riburne ex australi et
terram Jacobi Kintor ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus Andrea
goldsmitht patricio wys' et Andra nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator
altaris beati Duthaici infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij de abirdene situati et
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome
prat ex orientali et terram thome mar ex australi et communionem viam
regiam versus oriens et occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus georgio byssat
Willelmo cuming et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes penny
prior domus fratrum predicatorum de Abirdene et protestabatur pro vno annuo Redditu sex
s' et viij d' sibi et dicte domui et conuentui annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome prat
ex orientali et terram thome mar ex australi et communionem viam regiam
versus boriam et occidens Ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Curia presentavit in sacculo tanquam secundo
die huius processus Testibus Andrea lousone Willelmo cuming et Dun
cano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes
penny prior domus et conuentus fratrum predicatorum de Abirdene et protestabatur
pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' sibi et dicto conuentui annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex
orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Richardi Kintor
ex australi et terram quondam thome Croudane ex boreali ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tam secundo die huius
processus Testibus andrea lousone Willelmo cuminge et Duncano
Straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus rolland'
Collector ac procurator capellanorum collegij de Abirdone et protestabatur
pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et viij d' annuatim dictis capellanis
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico Castri inter terram
quondam Ade Kymesone ex boreali et communionem viam regiam ex
australi Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne sclubysclugy Willelmo Scrimgeour et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Kynninmond' capellanus ac procurator
altaris beate Katherine virginis infra ecclesiam cathedrale Abirdonensis cituati
et protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo Redditu x s' sibi et dicto
altari annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico castri inter
terram quondam Ade Kymesone ex boreali et communionem viam regiam ex australi
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne sclugy Willelmo Scrimgeour' et Andrea nachty seriando

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day viij
dais to patrik Wys' to ansuer to Jonhne Colisone for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of five markis and xij barrelis of beir

The samyn day thomas narne follouit Ellene the spous' of Jonhne
Club for ix s' quhilk scho tuk to preif pait this day viij
dais

The saide day sere Alexander club grantit to pay to Androw culan Curat
to Alexander Symsone sone and ayr to Dauid Symsone five schil
lingis at the next Witsonday and xl d' termlie at the termes of marty
mes and Witsonday for ane wast lande liand' in the vuirkirkgate
processit be the said androw pertening to the brethir barnis of the saide
sere Alexander

The samyn day patrik Wys' grantit him avand to sere Jonhe
Stirueling xiij s' and iiij d' quhilkis the officiar' at commavnd'
of the balyeis chargit him to pay or ellis remane within the
tolbutht And' to the frethin of him he oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie his hand vphaldin to the balyeis to pay the said xiij
s' and iiij d' to the said sere Jonhne at Witsonday next eftir follouing
or at the trinite thareftir at the farrast vnrepreuit befor thir witnes
thomas fyf Dauid' prat Jhon' menyeis balyeis thomas Waus sere
Androw henrisone sere mathow nicholsone and James gordone

The samyn day Adam heruy was conuikit be ane assis' Wilyeam
blinsel forspekar for the wranguis' haldin of vij s' fra the
factouris of the bischop of murray

The samyn day the aldirman balyeis consale and communite
beand' present for the tyme grantit and ordanit ane acquitance
vndir thar commone Sele to be gevin to sere Jhon' ruthirfurd knicht
of his wattir maile of half ane nethis fischingis of the Rak
for fiwe yeris to giddir to be runnyn eftir this Instant fischinge
the said acquitance beginnand' one the vigile of Sanct Androw
next hereftir follouing And to discharge the said knicht his ayris
executoris and assignez of the fiwe yeris maile of the said demi nethis fischingis
Immediatelie to be runnyn for the Some of fyfty markis aucht
to him be the hale tovne as the decret of the lordis of consale
gevin tharapon proportis

The said day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day aucht dais
to Jonhne lammyntone and margaret fechat to cum befor tham and the consale
to bring with tham the evidentis writis and richtis that thai haue and
wil vys' anent ane annuel rente of xxiij s' of the land of
vmquhil Dauid hil as thai wil wyne and tyne

The saide day the consale and communite present for the tyme ordanit
the aldirman to caus' the balyeis and officiaris to pas' to thame
that fischis apone the wattir of Done that clam has nocht pait male
nor girssome And tak out thar nethis of the said wattir In
defalt of maile and girsone as it that was askit at thame
obefor and coud' nocht be gottyne

Eodem die perlectis processibus per dominum matheum nichol
sone capellanum ac procuratorem altaris beati petri apostolorum principis infra ecclesiam
parrochialem Sancte nicholaij de Abirdene situati de et super recuperacione proprie
tatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Walteri
pyot ex australi ex vna et terram quondam thome crovdane ex boreali
partibus ex altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens in
defectu solucionis vnius annuj Redditus xxtj s' sibi et dicto altari
debit' a longo tempore et non solut' v s' Johannes colison prelocutor
dicti dominj mathei peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus prece
dentis Juris et iusticie complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata
decreuit quod prefatus dominus matheus proprietatem et possessionem dicte
terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis annuj Redditus
antedicti Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie
pro Judicio datum fuit Teste Curia

The xvij day of aprile the yer' forsaid' William vmfray
become Souerte be his hand landis and gudis to Dauid prat
ane of the ballieis that marione quhit sal nocht sel wedset
nor annaly the land of vmquhil Robert quhit hir fadir
that scho is nov sesit in liand in the gallougate betuix the land
of Jonhne Sanclar' one the northt partis and the land of Jonhne
bremar' and Androw smitht one the southt partis nor nayne
annuel rent of it for yer' and day hereftir follouing vnto
the tyme that it be seyne gif ony vthir ayr' cumis to follow
the said' lande And' the said marione has oblist hir be
hir handis landis and gudis Ande specialie be the said lande
to freithe and keipe the saide Williame his ayris executouris and assignais
skathtles of the said' borrougange Ande grantit to deliuer
hir Instrument of Sesin of the said lande to the said Wil
yeam in kepin quhil ane yer' and day begane
